特記事項:
この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。

本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This course will be instructed through seminars examining different aspects of the TOEIC test. Students will have opportunities to have discussions based on topics that are relevant to the test and through activities that are designed to develop vocabulary. There will be a strong emphasis on group and pair work throughout. Practice tests (parts and whole) and vocabulary quizzes will be used. Active student interaction and participation is a strong expectation of this course. Currently, the intention is for this class to be taught face-to-face; adaptations may be made in light of changing conditions and university policies. Students are expected to follow safety protocols (i.e. wearing masks and respecting social distancing) during all face-to-face classes.
